thread.title: Game Of Thrones star and Britain's tallest man Neil Fingleton has died aged 36
thread.title_full: Game Of Thrones star and Britain's tallest man Neil Fingleton has died aged 36

author: Saphora Smith
title: Game Of Thrones star and Britain's tallest man Neil Fingleton has died aged 36
text:
Sunday 26 February 2017 15:48 GMT Click to followThe Evening Standard Neil Fingleton (right) has died Rex Features 
Game Of Thrones star and Britainâ€™s tallest man Neil Fingleton has died at the age of 36, it has been reported. 
Once named as Britain's tallest man, the 7'7" star played Mag The Mighty in the fantasy series and also took on roles in X-Men: First Class and Jupiter Ascending. 
According to reports, he passed away following heart failure on Saturday. 
A statement posted on the Tall Persons Club group Facebook page on Sunday read: "Sadly it has come to our attention that Neil Fingleton Britain's Tallest man passed away on Saturday. 
"Neil became Britain's Tallest man in 2007 passing the height of Chris Greener. 
"Neil started off in basketball in the USA before becoming a actor and starring in the X-men first class and also recently in the Game of Thrones. 
"Our thoughts and condolences go out to his family." More about:
